description: Manifest of filterable groups extracted from ftl_starburst.clj for historical caching

groups.group_name: YINN YANG Mean Reversion [FTL Copy] w/ WAM Updated Package
groups.description: China 3x leveraged bull/bear mean reversion with WAM overlay

groups.group_name: LABU LABD Mean Reversion [FTL Copy] w/ WAM Updated Package
groups.description: Biotech 3x leveraged bull/bear mean reversion with WAM overlay

groups.group_name: DRV DRN Mean Reversion [FTL Copy] w/ WAM Updated Package
groups.description: Real Estate 3x leveraged bull/bear mean reversion with WAM overlay

groups.group_name: WYLD Mean Reversion Combo v2 w/ Overcompensating Frontrunner [FTL]
groups.description: Composite of 3 mean reversion sub-groups scored by inner filter
KMLM/Tech switch, Foreign Rat (EDC/EDZ), JRT stocks (LLY, NVO, COST, PGR, GE)

groups.group_name: NOVA | (multiple TQQQ, one crypto) KMLM switcher (single pops) MonkeyBusiness  WM74|
groups.description: Multi-level RSI chain, resolves to TQQQ in most conditions with volatility hedges
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs UVXY (window 11), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs SOXL (window 10), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs FNGU (window 9), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs UUP (window 10), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs VDE (window 10), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs SMH (window 11), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs AVUV (window 12), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Max drawdown filter: TQQQ vs NAIL (window 12), scored by stdev-return at portfolio level
Composite: stdev-return(12) select-top 1 across 8 MAX DD sub-groups
1x ETF bull/bear rotator: RSI gate AGG(15)>QQQ(15), MAR(4) select-bottom 3
3x leveraged bull/bear rotator: RSI gate AGG(15)>QQQ(15), MAR(4) select-bottom 2/3

notes: Inner groups (yinn_yang, labu_labd, drv_drn) are scored by the WYLD combo's inner filter
Top-level groups (wyld_combo, walters_champagne, nova_switcher) are scored by 3 top-level filters
8 MAX DD groups are scored by stdev-return(12) select-top 1 inside Overcompensating Frontrunner
Muted WAMCore and WAMCore are scored by moving-average-return(5) select-top 1 inside WAM sections
MAX DD groups are identical across all 3 mean-reversion sub-groups -- extracted once, shared
WAMCore groups are identical across all 3 mean-reversion sub-groups -- extracted once, shared
The cache Lambda evaluates each group daily and stores its portfolio selection + daily return
Groups with depends_on must be evaluated after their dependencies within each Lambda invocation
